title: couldn't ban, twice in a row, lost 13 all because client wouldn't let me click the BAN button
body: Can I get my 13 LP back?

replies.body: That sounds like a really lousy streak, and it sucks to hear that champion select isn't responding.  We can't adjust stats or LP, but I'd like to help get the issue resolved.  Unless you have any third party programs running, your issue might be caused by a network problem that's failing to receive your selection, and ultimately leaving you behind.  You should run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you've got any questions.
